product_name: Seirus Dynamax Sound Touch Glove Liners
long_description: The Seirus Dynamax Sound Touch glove liners help keep your hands warm, even when damp. They're great for skiing, biking or any active outdoor sport. Thermax(R) polyester fabric pulls moisture away from hands and dries quickly. Tips of the thumbs and index fingers feature fabric that makes the Seirus Dynamax Sound Touch glove liners touch-screen compatible. Can be used as a liners under waterproof shells or gloves worn alone in mild conditions.
short_description: The Seirus Dynamax Sound Touch glove liners help keep your hands warm, even when damp. They're great for skiing, biking or any active outdoor sport.
